attributes.action: scrap the idea of replacing trident
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should listen to the views of the people.There is a feeling within the country that the large amounts of money( life-time estimated cost 76 billion ) spent on replacing trident could be better spent.Nuclear disarmament and the non proliferation of weapons of mass destruction will help secure the future for our world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
